title: Internship at General Dynamics
description: Began a 4 month internship in Ottawa Ontario as an embedded software intern at General Dynamics. During this time, I worked with the advanced vetronic systems (AVS) team on a consolidated firmware core intended for use within GD's smart displays, integrated fire control systems, and tactical networks

title: Internship at Teck Resources Limited
description: Began an 8 month internship in Sparwood, BC as a mining systems intern at Teck Resources Limited.

title: Started University at UBC
description: Studying Electrical Engineering at the University of British Columbia, Vancouver
